name: Forget Me Not, My Love
storyline:
Just before the wedding, you lost your memory in an accident.
Those happy memories, the mediocrity of daily life, I can't remember nothing...

When you awaken, suddenly, five men are standing by your bedside?! It's nothing incredible to hear until you see an engagement ring roll out of your pocket.

You're in love with... Who?
summary: “We’re your fiances.” Three of your fiances show up after you wake up in the hospital! However, you can’t remember a single thing since you’ve lost all of your memories… Everything is a haze now due to you getting in an accident, and all you want to know is: who is your real fiance?

videos.title: Forget Me Not, My Love Prologue
